wmndsDisruptionIndicatorSmallProps.name: mode
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorSmallProps.description: Required. Specifies the travel mode which the disruption relates to. Accepted values are: bus, coach, cycle, metro, plane, rail, roads and walk

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorSmallProps.name: iconRight
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorSmallProps.description: The icon tag which specifies the icon to show to the right of the indicator (see icon reference). Default value is general-warning-circle

wmndsDisruptionIndicatorSmallProps.name: classes
wmndsDisruptionIndicatorSmallProps.description: List of additional classes which will be added to the disruption indicator. A typical use case is modifying the badge colour to indicate severity e.g. wmnds-disruption-indicator-small--severe
